entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
